title: Businessweek Extra- Chris Beyrer
itunes:title: Businessweek Extra- Chris Beyrer
description:
Dr. Chris Beyrer, Professor in Public Health and Human Rights at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, talks about the FDA meeting regarding Pfizer vaccine authorization.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
